job_title: Primary School Teacher in Southampton, England
pros: Its a fulfilling occupation and you have a chance to rebuild lives
cons: Some of the backgrounds of the children were traumatizing.

job_title: Marketing & Communications Director in Cambridge, England
cons: Such a shame some of the people involved have been appalling.

review_title: Worst place I have ever been,  AVOID
pros: Among senior staff the IT manager is lovely, the only decent human being there. Good salary (but money was not enough to bribe me to stay and take any bullying)
cons: Micromanagement, stealing ideas, not listening to expert advice, alienating donors, covering up mistakes, blame culture. Insufficient training.
